chunk:
CALM Skin Care Hot Chocolate Aromatherapy Powder Facial Mask

Brand: CALM Skin Care

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Acai Berry Powder, Agar, Arrowroot Powder, Cocoa Powder, Coconut Milk Powder, Maltodextrin, Papaya Leaf (Carica Papaya), Raspberry Leaf, Sodium Caseinate

Directions: 1 tsp mask + 1.5 tsp water 
Mix, Heat 10-15 secs, Stir and Apply warm
book: 2487-CALM Skin Care Hot Chocolate Aromatherapy Powder Facial Mask

chunk:
Stir and Apply warm Remove after 15 mins/dry 5 masks per packet

Warnings: All Natural - Use within 3 months of opening

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 2487-CALM Skin Care Hot Chocolate Aromatherapy Powder Facial Mask
